pkgmetadata.longdescription: Performs Bayesian Variable Selection on the Covariates in a Semi- Competing Risks Model // Uses Stochastic Search Variable Selection to select important covariates in the three hazard functions of a semi-competing risks model. This function performs the Gibbs sampler for variable selection and a Metropolis-Hastings-Green sampler for the number of split points and parameters for the three baseline hazard function. This function returns the posterior sample of all quantities sampled in the Gibbs sampler after a burn-in period to a desired file location.
